subject: Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: In what will probably stand as his last major personnel move, Donnie Walsh selected Iman Shumpert with the 17th pick in the N.B.A. draft.
snippet: In what will probably stand as his last major personnel move, Donnie Walsh selected Iman Shumpert with the 17th pick in the N.B.A. draft.
